txt.en: Rhûd-pulo-Drât can be found in Drû Bhûta.\n\nYou should speak with Rhûd-pulo-Drât.
Ghân-buri-Ghân believes Rhûd-pulo-Drât may need the newly constructed ward more than the entire village of Drû Bhûta to protect the Drúadan Wood.
'The ancients look down upon us, even in darkness and cold.  I let them guide me further still. There is more to be done, [placeholder].'

'Go, speak with Rhûd-pulo-Drât. He come back to Drû Bhûta. Bring Rhûd-pulo-Drât the Okwô-kuryô heart. He is wise Drúadan and always has good thoughts. They come to him from the hearts of the ancients.'
Rhûd-pulo-Drât can be found in Drû Bhûta.\n\nYou should speak with Rhûd-pulo-Drât.

You hand the mysterious Okwô-kuryô heart to Rhûd-pulo-Drât. He looks it over.\n\n'Very very good. This heart beats strong. You a good heart. Sorry I run away from [placeholder]. Thought you were Dheghûn. Now I have plan. Okwô-kuryô protect Drúedain but many broken. Some in pieces, other just not work. I have thought to fix the Okwô-kuryô who just not work. Need your help, [placeholder]. Come with me.'
